citations.narrative:
An excessive amount of feces is built up underneath three rabbit enclosures housing a total of 3 rabbits. The buildup is
approximately 1.5 feet high. The licensee stated it gets cleaned about once a year. The buildup of fecal matter
underneath the enclosures can contribute to the spread of disease. The licensee must thoroughly clean underneath the
enclosures and remove the buildup of excreta on a weekly basis. Correct by 5/2/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End of report.
n

narrative:
3.56(a)(3) 
   
Sanitation. 
An excessive amount of feces is built up underneath three rabbit enclosures housing a total of 3 rabbits. The buildup is 
approximately 1.5 feet high. The licensee stated it gets cleaned about once a year. The buildup of fecal matter 
underneath the enclosures can contribute to the spread of disease. The licensee must thoroughly clean underneath the 
enclosures and remove the buildup of excreta on a weekly basis. Correct by 5/2/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
